compounddef.title: A curated list of work and projects using manif

sect1.title: They cite us
sect1.para: You may find on Google Scholar publications citing either:

listitem.para: the Lie theory paper accompanying manif - see here
the manif library paper - see here

sect1.title: They use manif

listitem.para: lie-group-controllers, header-only C++ libraries containing controllers designed for Lie Groups.
bipedal-locomotion-framework, The BipedalLocomotionFramework project is a suite of libraries for achieving bipedal locomotion on humanoid robots.

sect1.para: Your project is not listed here? Let us know about it!
